snippet: Listening in as three movers and shakers offer advice on taking companies to the top.
abstract: David Segal reviews audiobooks Zero to One: Notes on Startups; Or, How to Build the Future, written by Peter Thiel with Blake Masters and narrated by Masters, Good Profit: How Creating Value for Others Built One of the World's Most Successful Companies, written by Charles G Koch and narrated by Paul Michael, and Team of Teams: New Rules of Engagement for a Complex World, written by Stanley McChrystal with Tantum Collins, David Silverman and Chris Fussell and narrated by Paul Michael.
lead_paragraph: Listening in as three movers and shakers offer advice on taking companies to the top.

headline.main: ‘Zero to One,’ ‘Good Profit’ and ‘Team of Teams’
